title: XML Prompt Generator
subtitle: Create custom XML structures for your AI prompts in a simple and intuitive way.
noElements: No elements — add one to get started.
pasteHint: Paste Markdown, code, or text here...
confirmDeleteBody: Are you sure you want to delete this element and all its children?
confirmClearBody: This will remove all elements. This action is irreversible.
Turning on Code block will wrap content: Turning on "Force as code (CDATA)" will wrap the content in a CDATA section and disable automatic child generation for this tag.
pasteImportPrompt: Paste your XML here to import it into the structure
